important_notices.title: Login Credentials
important_notices.content: Please check your payment receipt for username and password of customer care interface.

important_notices.title: Password Security
important_notices.content: Since the default username and passwords are set to be the same, customers are requested to change it as soon as they log into the portal.

important_notices.title: Router Configuration
important_notices.content: If you are using your ADSL Connection in Routing Mode, please change your authentication mode to AUTO or PAP in your ADSL router.
